column1: #Text=White Lotus leader says : " Do you believe she 's ready , Master Katara ? "
#Text=It 's time for you to begin your airbending training .
#Text=I mean , thank you all for believing in me .
#Text=" Korra says : " Naga , you should have seen it !
#Text=I kicked some firebender butt , and I passed !
#Text=Tenzin will be here in a few days .
